FOOTER.INFORMATIONS_CONTENT: With us, your journey will be comfortable, safe, and tailored to your wishes – anywhere in Slovenia or Europe.
FOOTER.COMPANY_DATA: © 2025 Toman d.o.o. — Posavec 131, 4244 Podnart, Slovenia — VAT number: SI95427201

HERO.TITLE: Enjoy a comfortable and pleasant experience
HERO.CONTENT: With Toman bus transport, your journey will be pleasant and comfortable. We will ensure that you have the best experience and discover the most beautiful new places. We offer a complete service, where we are happy to meet your requirements and expectations. All buses are equipped with all tourist amenities. We also offer VIP transport with top-of-the-range vehicles. Our drivers are professionally trained and have extensive knowledge of domestic and European destinations. We operate in accordance with applicable traffic, labour and tax legislation, and both passengers and vehicles are insured.

WHO_WE_ARE.TITLE: Doživite udobno in prijetno izkušnjo
WHO_WE_ARE.SUBTITLE: Kdo smo
WHO_WE_ARE.CONTENT_1: Udobno, zanesljivo in brezskrbno – to je naš pristop k avtobusnim prevozom. Ne glede na to, ali gre za izlet, poslovni dogodek ali šolsko ekskurzijo, vas popeljemo varno in pravočasno do cilja. Naši avtobusi so sodobno opremljeni, vozniki izkušeni, storitev pa vedno prilagojena vašim željam. Vaše potovanje naj se začne z zaupanjem – mi poskrbimo za vse ostalo.
WHO_WE_ARE.CONTENT_2: V kolikor bi želeli, da vam pripravimo točno ponudbo nas pokličite, pošljite e-mail sporočilo ali pa nas kontaktirajte preko obrazca za rezervacijo avtobusnega prevoza.

SERVICES.TITLE: Wherever You Need to Be — We'll Get You There
SERVICES.SUBTITLE: Our services

FIRST.TITLE: Airport Transfers
FIRST.CONTENT: Reliable and stress-free transfers to and from the airport — always on time.

SECOND.TITLE: Seaport Transfers
SECOND.CONTENT: Smooth and timely connections to cruise ports — start your journey right.

THIRD.TITLE: Travel Trips
THIRD.CONTENT: Day and multi-day transport for groups — comfortable, flexible, and safe.

FOURTH.TITLE: School Transports
FOURTH.CONTENT: Safe and punctual school transfers with vetted drivers and dedicated routes.

FIFTH.TITLE: Corporate Transports
FIFTH.CONTENT: Professional transport for business events, clients, and executives.

SIXTH.TITLE: Transportation On Request
SIXTH.CONTENT: Custom transport solutions tailored to your needs. Contact us for flexible options.

VIP_TRANSFERS.TITLE: Popolno udobje in prestiž po meri
VIP_TRANSFERS.SUBTITLE: VIP Prevozi
VIP_TRANSFERS.CONTENT_1: Za posebne priložnosti ali pomembne poslovne poti ponujamo vrhunske prevoze z luksuznimi vozili višjega cenovnega razreda. Naša storitev je popolnoma prilagojena vašim željam – zagotovimo vam udobno, varno in brezskrbno potovanje na najvišji ravni.
VIP_TRANSFERS.CONTENT_2: Naši izkušeni in diskretni vozniki poskrbijo, da prispete točno, sproščeno in v stilu – kamorkoli v Sloveniji ali Evropi. Pokličite nas ali pošljite e-mail in z veseljem vam pripravimo individualno ponudbo.

FLEET.TITLE: Reliable, comfortable, and ready to go
FLEET.SUBTITLE: Our Fleet

C_CLASS.NAME: Mercedes-Benz C-Class
C_CLASS.DESCRIPTION: The Mercedes-Benz C-Class with AMG styling combines sporty elegance with premium comfort. Its refined interior and dynamic ride make it ideal for business transfers, individual transport, or stylish occasions where making an impression matters.

V_CLASS.NAME: Mercedes-Benz V-Class
V_CLASS.DESCRIPTION: The extended Mercedes-Benz V-Class offers exceptional space and flexibility for up to 7 passengers. With comfortable seating, a luxurious interior, and modern features, it's the perfect choice for business trips, family outings, or VIP transfers. This van blends elegance with practicality to ensure a high level of comfort on every journey.

LION_COACH_1.NAME: MAN Lionʼs Coach
LION_COACH_1.DESCRIPTION: Experience modern comfort with our newer MAN Lion’s Coach. Featuring 51+1+1 seats, it’s an excellent choice for larger groups seeking space and reliability. The coach is equipped with air conditioning, a TV, and a refrigerator to ensure a smooth and pleasant journey. Ideal for both long-distance trips and corporate or day tours.

LION_COACH_2.NAME: MAN Lionʼs Coach
LION_COACH_2.DESCRIPTION: Experience the pinnacle of luxury travel with our Man Lion's Coach. With 49+1 seats, this coach offers ample space for a comfortable journey. Enjoy onboard amenities such as a TV, toilete, air conditioning, and a refrigerator. Whether it's a corporate event, airport transfer, or group excursion, our Man Lion's Coach ensures a seamless and lavish travel experience.

TRAVEGO.NAME: Mercedes-Benz Travego
TRAVEGO.DESCRIPTION: Embark on a remarkable journey with our Mercedes Benz Travego. Designed to accommodate 51+2 passengers, this coach combines elegance and functionality. Stay entertained with the onboard TV, relax in the refreshing air-conditioned environment, and keep your refreshments cool in the refrigerator. Whether it's a long-distance trip or a sightseeing tour, our Mercedes Benz Travego guarantees a stylish and comfortable ride.

SETRA.NAME: Setra 416 GT-HD
SETRA.DESCRIPTION: Indulge in luxury and sophistication with our Setra 416 GT HD coach. With seating for 53+2 passengers, this coach provides an abundance of space and comfort. Enjoy your favorite shows on the onboard TV, benefit from the convenience of a toilete, and experience a pleasant journey with the climate control and refrigerator. Whether it's a special event or a group excursion, our Setra 416 GT HD ensures a first-class travel experience.

BUSINESS_PARTNERS.TITLE: Our Business Partners
BUSINESS_PARTNERS.SUBTITLE: Trusted by clients throughout Slovenia and Europe

PRIVACY_POLICY.TITLE: Privacy policy
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_FIRST: TOMAN Transport Ltd. respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you about how we handle your personal information when you visit our website (regardless of where you visit it from) and informs you about your privacy rights and how the law protects you.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_SECOND: During the use of our website, we may ask you to provide certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to, your name, address, email address, and phone number. We use this data to improve our services, respond to your inquiries, process your orders, and comply with legal obligations.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_THIRD: We may disclose your personal data to third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, order fulfillment, or data analysis. All third-party service providers must take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_FORTH: We have implemented appropriate security measures to prevent accidental loss, use, or unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure of your personal data.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_FIFTH: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You may also object to the processing of your personal data under certain circumstances.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_SIXTH: Any changes we make to our privacy policy in the future will be posted on this page. Please check regularly for any updates or changes to our privacy policy.
PRIVACY_POLICY.SECTION_CONTENT_SEVENTH: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at
